description:
This is a market on whether President Joseph Biden will use the following word(s) at least once in his State of the Union address scheduled for March 1, 2022, 9 PM ET:

“SWIFT”
"SWIFT'S"
“Society for Worldwide Interbank Financial Telecommunications”

This market concerns the State of the Union address, not any later speeches or the Response to the State of the Union address.

The market will resolve to “Yes” if Biden says “SWIFT”, "SWIFT's" or “Society for Worldwide Interbank Financial Telecommunications” during the State of the Union address as verified by live video, the official transcript, and other credible sources. Otherwise, this market will resolve to “No”.

References to “SWIFT” or “Society for Worldwide Interbank Financial Telecommunications”, or parts of the phrases not used in constructing a full phrasing (ex: “The Society”, “Financial Telecommunications”) will not count - only the exact phrasings cited will be considered.

“SWIFT” must be mentioned in its use as an acronym for this market to resolve to “Yes”. Any use of the term “swift” as a part of speech that does not specifically reference The Society for Worldwide Interbank Financial Telecommunications will not be sufficient to trigger a “Yes” resolution. (Ex: if Biden states “We responded to swift Russian aggression” it will not be sufficient to trigger a “Yes” resolution).

If the State of the Union does not occur by March 7, 2022, 11:59:59 PM ET, this market will resolve to 50-50.

This will be the first State of the Union address delivered by President Biden.

The State of the Union can be watched on the official White House youtube page: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=mVIXLQrC9rE

events.description:
This is a market on President Biden's first State of the Union (SOTU) address scheduled for March 1, 9 PM ET, and what he will mention over its course. 

The conference can be watched live on the official White House YouTube channel: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=mVIXLQrC9rE
events.title: Biden's State of the Union: Will he mention...?

question: Will President Biden mention SWIFT in the 2022 State of the Union Address?
